channel.title: The game won't start - stuck after train ride
channel.description:
Hi, please help!
When I start the game, after the "intro" when I ride the train the game gets stuck. Music plays, I can enter menu and change settings etc., bud the image won't change, I can't do anythiing.
See the screenshot.
[url]https://imageshack.us/f/407/bmbuga.png/[/url]

item.title: The game won't start - stuck after train ride
item.dc:creator: cabm84
item.description:
vector:

Good news, i suppose.

The problem is Windows 8 and the fact that Steam software needs to write in Program Files folder. I solved it by running Steam as administrator, but I suppose when you install Steam you could place it somewhere else than C:\Program Files folder.

I guess when someone is running Win7 on user/guest account, it could end up with same issue.

Hi…I can’t solved the problem, I got windows xp 32 bits…Please Help,
The menu options don’t work also,

Read full topic
item.source: The game won't start - stuck after train ride

item.title: The game won't start - stuck after train ride
item.dc:creator: vector
item.description:
Good news, i suppose.

The problem is Windows 8 and the fact that Steam software needs to write in Program Files folder. I solved it by running Steam as administrator, but I suppose when you install Steam you could place it somewhere else than C:\Program Files folder.

I guess when someone is running Win7 on user/guest account, it could end up with same issue.

item.title: The game won't start - stuck after train ride
item.dc:creator: vector
item.description:
No problems at all, I just installed Steam, downloaded the engine needed (from link in this forum), but BMS into folder and run it. And this happened everytime, I tried to restart the game and steam three times, but always it stucks after train ride.

Read full topic
